channel.title: Pages on JacobZ
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on JacobZ

item.title: About
item.description:
The blog is the place for me to write down and share knowledge I learned. I’m not good at publicizing, but I still wish to have a place in the Internet with my hallmarks. I’m not confortable with sharing my personal life in the public Internet, but I probably will if I find it worth sharing with people.

Some links I saved are listed below, which might be useful for you~
